SEARCH
Package org.apache.tiles.request.jakarta.servlet

Class ExternalWriterHttpServletResponse

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
org.apache.tiles.request.jakarta.servlet.ExternalWriterHttpServletResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServletResponse, ServletResponse
public class ExternalWriterHttpServletResponse extends HttpServletResponseWrapper
Wraps an HTTP response and overrides its print writer.

Copied from Apache tiles-request-servlet 1.0.7 and adapted for Jakarta EE 9.

  • Field Summary
